intro: Volutaria socotrensis, commonly known as Socotra's starfish flower, is a unique plant endemic to the Socotra archipelago. It is characterized by its distinctive, star-shaped flowers that resemble the arms of a starfish, giving it its common name. The plant belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is known for its striking appearance and ecological significance in its native habitat. Volutaria socotrensis thrives in arid and rocky environments, adapting to the harsh conditions of Socotra. Due to its limited distribution and fragile ecosystem, it is considered a vulnerable species.
